suggested comment: Uniprot entry history

suggested comment: neXtProt entry history

label: GO qualifier
suggested comment: GO qualifier

label: Severity
suggested comment: Level of severity of a phenotype variation
column8: pam: NEW class for NEW named individuals Severe, Moderate Mild

label: Absorption max
suggested comment: Wavelength at which maximal light absorption by the photoreactive protein occurs. Other observed absorbance maxima (of lesser importance), lambda(max) for light emission, experimental or environmental remarks may also be included.

label: Absorption note
suggested comment: Note with additional information on light absorption by the photoreactive protein.

label: Active site
comment: Amino acid(s) directly involved in the activity of an enzyme
suggested comment: Amino acid(s) directly involved in the catalytic activity of the protein.

label: Activity regulation
suggested comment: Mechanisms which regulate the activity of the protein, including the components which regulate (by activation or inhibition) the reaction.

label: Allergen
comment: Allergenic properties: information relevant to allergenic proteins
suggested comment: Protein causing an allergic reaction.

label: Allergen name
comment: Class for allergen names
suggested comment: Allergen name.

label: Annotation type
comment: Most generic annotation class
suggested comment: A statement about a protein.

label: Antibody integration level
comment: Antibody integration level
suggested comment: Antibody integration level.

label: Antibody mapping
suggested comment: Fragment of the protein or PrESTs (Protein Epitope Signature Tags) used to generate antibodies by the Human Protein Atlas project.

label: Beta strand
comment: Beta strand regions within the experimentally determined protein structure
suggested comment: Beta strand within the protein structure.

label: Bgee developmental stage term
comment: Bgee controlled vocabulary of human developmental stages.
suggested comment: Term from the Bgee controlled vocabulary of human developmental stages.

label: Binary interaction
suggested comment: Interaction involving two proteins.

label: Binding site
comment: Binding site for any chemical group (co-enzyme, prosthetic group, etc.).
suggested comment: Binding site for any chemical group (co-enzyme, prosthetic group, etc.).

label: Biophysicochemical property
suggested comment: Biophysical and chemical properties of the protein, such as maximal absorption, kinetic parameters, pH dependence, redox potential and temperature dependence.

label: CD Antigen name
comment: Class for antigen names according to the cluster of differentiation nomenclature.
suggested comment: Antigen name according to the cluster of differentiation (CD) nomenclature.

label: Calcium-binding region
comment: Position(s) of calcium binding region(s) within the protein
suggested comment: Calcium binding region within the protein.

label: Catalytic activity
comment: Reaction(s) catalyzed by an enzyme.
suggested comment: Reaction(s) catalyzed by the protein.

label: Caution
comment: Warning about possible errors and/or grounds for confusion.
suggested comment: Warning about possible errors and/or grounds for confusion.

label: Cellular component
suggested comment: Cellular component where the protein is localized.

label: Cleavage site
comment: Cleavage site on the sequence.
suggested comment: Natural proteolytic cleavage site in the protein.

label: Cleaved region name
comment: Class for names related to a cleaved region of protein
suggested comment: Cleaved region name.

label: Cofactor
comment: Non-protein substance required for enzyme activity.
suggested comment: Non-protein substance required for enzyme activity.

label: Cofactor information
comment: Relevant information on protein cofactor(s)
suggested comment: Information on protein cofactor(s).

label: Coiled-coil region
comment: Positions of regions of coiled coil within the protein
suggested comment: Coiled-coil region within the protein.

label: Compositionally biased region
comment: Region of compositional bias in the protein
suggested comment: Region of compositional bias within the protein, in which a particular type of amino acid is over-represented.

label: Consortium
comment: Consortium
suggested comment: Name of a specific consortium, committee, or study group.

label: Cross-link
comment: Residues participating in covalent linkage(s) between proteins
suggested comment: Amino acid(s) participating in covalent linkage between proteins.

label: Database
comment: Database of the cross-reference
suggested comment: Database cross-referenced by neXtProt.

label: Developmental stage
comment: Expression of the gene product according to the cell stage and/or tissue or organism development
suggested comment: Information describing the expression of the gene product(s) at various stages of a cell, tissue or organism development.

label: Disease
comment: Involvement in disease: disease(s) associated with protein defect(s)
suggested comment: Disease associated with variations in the gene encoding the protein.

label: Disease-related variant
suggested comment: Amino acid variation in the protein associated with disease(s).

label: Disulfide bond
comment: Cysteine residues participating in disulfide bonds
suggested comment: Cysteine(s) participating in disulfide bonds.

label: DNA-binding region
comment: Position and type of a DNA-binding domain
suggested comment: DNA-binding region within the protein.

label: Domain
comment: Position and type of each modular protein domain
suggested comment: Region within the protein with a characteristic three-dimensional structure or fold.

label: Domain information
comment: Relevant information on protein domain(s)
suggested comment: Information describing domain(s).

label: eVOC Anatomical System term
comment: eVOC ontology for anatomical system. http://trac.genebio.com/~defaultuser/repository/anatomicalsystem.obo

label: eVOC Cell Type term
comment: eVOC ontology for cell types. http://trac.genebio.com/~defaultuser/repository/celltype.obo

label: eVOC term
comment: Expressed Sequence Annotation for Humans Provides structured controlled vocabularies for the annotation of expressed sequences with respect to anatomical system, cell type, developmental stage, experimental technique, microarray platform, pathology, pooling, tissue preparation and treatment.

label: eVOC Pathology term
comment: eVOC ontology for pathologies. http://trac.genebio.com/~defaultuser/repository/pathology.obo

label: Electrophysiological parameter
suggested comment: Biophysical properties of a ion channel.

label: Protein
comment: General information about a protein.
suggested comment: Sequence(s) of protein isoform(s) encoded by one or more human genes, and associated information.

label: Enzyme classification
comment: Ontology annotation by enzyme classification
suggested comment: Enzymatic activity of the protein annotated using the Enzyme Commission (EC) classification

label: Enzyme classification term
comment: Describes each type of enzyme for which an EC (Enzyme Commission) number has been provided
suggested comment: Number from the Enzyme Commission (EC) classification scheme for enzymes.

label: Enzyme name
comment: Class for enzyme names
suggested comment: Name from the Enzyme Commission (EC) classification scheme for enzymes.

label: Evidence
comment: Evidence
suggested comment: Information supporting an annotation concerning the protein.

label: Evidence code term
comment: Set of terms used to describe information that is used to support an assertion
suggested comment: Term from the ECO controlled vocabulary of evidence and assertion methods.

label: eVOC Development Stage term
comment: eVOC ontology of human development stages
suggested comment: Term from the eVOC controlled vocabulary of human developmental stages.

comment: Experimental variables related to evidences
suggested comment: Experimental context in which the protein was studied.

label: Expression
suggested comment: Expression of the gene product(s) in cells or in tissues.

label: Expression info
comment: Expression annotation to summarize expression levels measured in a series of experiments
suggested comment: Information on the expression of the gene product(s) in cells or in tissues.

label: Expression level
comment: Expression levels detected during experiment
suggested comment: Observed expression (:Positive :High :Medium :Low :Negative) of the gene product(s).
column8: in a given organ, tissue, cell type, fluid or gestational structure?

label: Expression profile
comment: Expression of the gene product in different tissues
suggested comment: Expression of the gene product(s) in a given organ, tissue, cell type, fluid or gestational structure.

label: Family name
comment: Family classification
suggested comment: Information on the family of proteins to which the protein belongs.

label: Function
suggested comment: Function(s) of the protein.

label: Function info
comment: General function(s) of a protein
suggested comment: Information on the function(s) of the protein.

label: Functional region name
comment: Class for names related to a functional region of a protein
suggested comment: Functional region name

label: Gene
comment: General information about a gene.
suggested comment: Information about the gene(s) encoding the protein isoform sequence(s) described in the entry.

label: Gene name
comment: Class for gene names
suggested comment: Gene name.

label: General Annotation
suggested comment: Annotation describing a biological aspect of the protein.

label: Modified phenotype
suggested comment: Modification of a normal phenotype due to a change (variant, PTM, etc.) in the protein.
column8: pam: deleted, not used any more

label: Glycosylation site
comment: Covalently attached glycan group(s)
suggested comment: Amino acid covalently attached to a glycan group (mono-, di-, or polysaccharide).

label: GO biological process
comment: Ontology annotation by go biological process
suggested comment: Involvement of the protein in a larger process, or ‘biological program’.

label: GO biological process term
comment: Ontology to describe gene and gene product attributes. This is the part of GO describing biological processes
suggested comment: Term from the GO controlled vocabulary of biological processes.

label: GO cellular component
comment: Ontology annotation by go cellular component
suggested comment: Location in the cell of the mature protein using the Gene Ontology cellular component vocabulary.

label: GO cellular component term
comment: Ontology to describe gene and gene product attributes. This is the part of GO describing cellular components
suggested comment: Term from the GO controlled vocabulary of cellular components.

label: GO term
comment: The Gene Ontology project provides a controlled vocabulary to describe gene and gene product attributes in any organism

label: GO molecular function
comment: Ontology annotation by go molecular function
suggested comment: Activity of the protein at the molecular level.

label: GO molecular function term
comment: Ontology to describe gene and gene product attributes. This is the part of GO describing molecular functions
suggested comment: Term from the GO controlled vocabulary of molecular functions.

label: Helix
comment: Helical regions within the experimentally determined protein structure
suggested comment: Helical region within the protein structure.

label: Protein record history
comment: A history of a protein entry
suggested comment: History of the entry.
column8: split -> UNiProt & neXtProt history pam: yes, but History remains as the general class above them

label: Identifier
comment: Identifier
suggested comment: Identifier

label: Induction
comment: Effects of environmental factors on gene expression
suggested comment: Effect of chemical compounds, environmental factors or transcriptional regulators on the expression of the protein.

label: Initiator methionine
comment: Cleavage of the initiator methionine
suggested comment: Initiator methionine cleaved during protein processing.

label: Interacting region
comment: Region interacting with another macromolecule.
suggested comment: Smallest region within the protein experimentally shown to participate in a given binary protein interaction.

label: Interaction
suggested comment: Interaction(s) of the protein with other proteins or molecules.

label: Interaction info
comment: Subunit structure: interaction with other protein(s)
suggested comment: Information on the protein quaternary structure and interaction(s) with other proteins or protein complexes.

label: Interaction mapping
suggested comment: Region within the protein shown experimentally  to participate in a given binary protein interaction.

label: International Non proprietary Name
comment: Class for international non proprietary names (INN)
suggested comment: International non-proprietary name (INN) of a protein.

label: Intramembrane region
suggested comment: Region within the protein interacting with the membrane lipid bilayer.

label: Isoform
comment: Protein isoform.
suggested comment: Protein product generated by alternative splicing, alternative promoter usage, and alternative translation initiation. Protein isoforms have different sequences.

label: Protein isoform name
comment: Class for protein isoform names
suggested comment: Protein isoform name.

label: Keywords
column8: pam: removed from annot type hierarchy

label: Kinetic KM
suggested comment: Michaelis constant (KM). This is the substrate concentration at which the reaction rate is half of its maximal value.

label: Kinetic note
suggested comment: Note with additional information on the kinetic data for the protein.

label: Kinetic Vmax
suggested comment: Maximal velocity (Vmax). Vmax is the reaction rate attained when the enzyme sites are saturated with substrate.

label: Large scale publication
comment: A publication is considered a large scale publication when its content is regarding 15 proteins or more
suggested comment: Publication relevant to 15 or more protein entries.

label: Lipid moiety-binding region
comment: Lipidation: covalently attached lipid group(s)
suggested comment: Amino acid(s) covalently attached to a lipid group.

label: Mammalian phenotype
suggested comment: Phenotype observed in a cell, tissue or organism.

label: Mammalian phenotype term
comment: Ontology to describe mammalian phenotype.
suggested comment: Term from the MGI controlled vocabulary of mammalian phenotypes.

label: Mapping
suggested comment: Mapping of sequences (PrEST, peptide, etc.) to the protein isoform sequence.

label: Mature protein
comment: Extent of an active peptide or a polypetide chain in the mature protein
suggested comment: Mature form of the protein. Processing (signal peptide and propeptide cleavage, transit peptide cleavage or initiator methionine cleavage) is required for maturation.

label: Medical
suggested comment: Medically-relevant information on the protein.

label: MeSH anatomy term
comment: National Library of Medicine's controlled vocabulary thesaurus. This is the A (anatomy) part
suggested comment: Term from the NLM controlled vocabulary of medical subject headings (MeSH), A part (anatomy).

label: MeSH term
comment: National Library of Medicine's controlled vocabulary thesaurus
suggested comment: Term from the NLM controlled vocabulary of medical subject headings (MeSH).

label: Metal binding site
comment: Binding site for a metal ion
suggested comment: Amino acid directly involved in binding a metal ion.

label: Miscellaneous
comment: Any relevant information that doesn't fit in any other defined sections
suggested comment: Information on the protein that doesn't fall into the scope of any other section.

label: Miscellaneous region
comment: Region of interest in the sequence
suggested comment: Region of interest within the protein.

label: Miscellaneous site
comment: Interesting single amino acid site on the sequence
suggested comment: Amino acid of interest within the protein.

label: Mitochondrial transit peptide
suggested comment: Transit peptide responsible for the transport of the protein to mitochondria.

label: Modified residue
comment: Modified residues
suggested comment: Amino acid modified post-translationally (excluding lipids, glycans and protein cross-links).

label: Mutagenesis
comment: Site which has been experimentally altered by mutagenesis.
suggested comment: Amino acid which has been experimentally altered by mutagenesis.

label: Name
comment: Most general class for names
suggested comment: Name.

label: NCI Metathesaurus term
comment: Ontology to describe information that is used to support an assertion.
suggested comment: Term from the NCI Metathesaurus controlled vocabulary.

label: NCI thesaurus term
comment: National Cancer Institute's reference terminology resource for biomedical concepts
suggested comment: Term from the NCI Thesaurus controlled vocabulary.

label: Negative expression level
comment: Class of negative level of expression
suggested comment: Undetectable expression of the protein.
column8: in a given organ, tissue, cell type, fluid or gestational structure? pam: removed from schema

label: neXtProt human anatomy term
comment: neXtProt human anatomical ontology. Developed to allow to navigate through protein and mRNA expression data
suggested comment: Term from the neXtProt controlled vocabulary of human anatomy and cell types.

label: neXtProt annotation term
comment: neXtProt ontology for biosequence annotations. Set of terms and relationships used to describe the annotations of biological sequences.

label: UniProtKB carbohydrate term
comment: neXtProt controlled vocabulary of carbohydrates bound to human proteins  as derived from UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot

label: Cellosaurus term
comment: Controlled vocabulary of cell lines
suggested comment: Term from the Cellosaurus controlled vocabulary of cell lines.

label: neXtProt domain term
comment: neXtProt controlled vocabulary of domains, repeat and zinc fingers in human proteins as derived from UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot.
suggested comment: Term from the neXtProt controlled vocabulary of domains, repeat and zinc fingers in human proteins (derived from UniProt).

label: neXtProt family term
comment: neXtProt list of human protein families as derived from UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot
suggested comment: Term from the neXtProt list of human protein families (derived from UniProt).

label: Ion channel electrophysiology term
comment: Ontology that describes the electrophysiological properties of ion channels.
suggested comment: Term from the neXtProt controlled vocabulary of ion channel electrophysiology (ICEPO).

label: neXtProt metal term
comment: neXtProt controlled vocabulary of metal bound to human proteins as derived from UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot
suggested comment: Term from the neXtProt controlled vocabulary of metal bound to human proteins (derived from UniProt).

label: neXtProt modification effect term
comment: Ontology that describes the change resulting from a modification on a protein. Possible modifications include variations and post-translational modifications, while changes can be for example a sub-cellular localization, a phenotype, or a protein property.
suggested comment: Term from the neXtProt controlled vocabulary describing changes resulting from a modification on a protein. Possible modifications include variations and post-translational modifications, while changes can be for example a sub-cellular localization, a phenotype, or a protein property.

label: neXtProt protein property term
comment: Ontology that describes biophysical properties of proteins, such as stability.
suggested comment: Term from the neXtProt controlled vocabulary of protein properties.

label: neXtProt topology term
comment: neXtProt controlled vocabulary to describe the topology of regions for transmembrane proteins that span membrane compartments as derived from UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot
suggested comment: Term from the neXtProt controlled vocabulary describing the topology of  transmembrane protein regions that span membrane compartments (derived from UniProt).

label: Non-consecutive residue
comment: Indicates that two residues in a sequence are not consecutive
suggested comment: Two amino acids which are not consecutive and with a undetermined number of unsequenced residues between them.

label: Non-standard amino acid term
comment: Controled vocabulary for non-standard amino acids in protein sequences.
suggested comment: Term from the controlled vocabulary of non-standard amino acids in protein sequences.

label: Non-terminal residue
comment: The sequence is incomplete. Indicate that a residue is not the terminal residue of the complete protein
suggested comment: Amino acid which is not the terminal residue of the complete protein sequence. The sequence is incomplete.

label: Nucleotide phosphate-binding region
comment: Nucleotide phosphate binding region
suggested comment: Region binding nucleotide phosphates.

label: ORF name
comment: Class for names of open reading frames
suggested comment: Open reading frame (ORF) name of the gene encoding the protein isoform(s).

label: MIM term
comment: OMIM is a comprehensive, authoritative compendium of human genes and genetic phenotypes
suggested comment: Term from the OMIM controlled vocabulary of human genes and genetic phenotypes.

label: Organelle term
comment: List of organelles in which a mature protein is targeted using a transit peptide
suggested comment: Term from the controlled vocabulary of organelles to which transit peptides can transport proteins.

label: Pathway
comment: Associated metabolic pathways
suggested comment: Series of actions involving the protein and other molecules in a cell that leads to a certain product or a change in the cell.

label: PDB mapping
comment: Protein 3D structure
suggested comment: Region of the protein for which there is a 3D structure in PDB.

label: Peptide mapping
suggested comment: Peptide detected in a biological sample using mass spectrometry (MS).

label: Peroxisome transit peptide
suggested comment: Transit peptide responsible for the transport of the protein to peroxisomes.

label: Person
comment: Person
suggested comment: Person.

label: PH dependence
suggested comment: Optimum pH for protein activity, the variation of activity with pH variation and the pH stability of the protein.

label: Pharmaceutical
comment: Pharmaceutical use: use of as a pharmaceutical drug
suggested comment: Use of the protein as a pharmaceutical drug.

label: Phenotype variation
suggested comment: Variation in observed molecular or organism phenotype due to modifications to the protein.

label: Positional annotation
suggested comment: Annotation relevant to one or more amino acid(s) of the protein.

label: Positive expression level
comment: Class of positive expression level
suggested comment: Detected expression of the protein.
column8: in a given organ, tissue, cell type, fluid or gestational structure? pam: deleted from schema

label: Processing product
suggested comment: Part of the protein resulting from natural processing events.

label: Maturation peptide
comment: Part of a protein that is cleaved during maturation or activation
suggested comment: Part of the protein that is cleaved during maturation or activation. A propeptide generally has no independent biological function.

label: Protein existence level
comment: Protein existence detection method and reliabilty level
suggested comment: Type of evidence that supports the existence of the protein.

label: Protein name
comment: Class for protein names
suggested comment: Protein name.

label: Protein property
suggested comment: A property of the protein, such as stability.

label: Protein sequence
comment: Protein sequence object
suggested comment: Amino acid sequence of the protein isoform and its associated properties (length, molecular weight and isoelectric point)

label: Proteoform
comment: Protein isoform variation. Variations may include variants and PTMs.
suggested comment: Protein isoform which include modifications, such as variant(s) and PTM(s).

label: PSI-MI Molecular Interaction term
comment: Data exchange format for molecular interactions proposed by the HUPO Proteomics Standards Initiative
suggested comment: Term from the PSI-MI controlled vocabulary of molecular interactions.

label: PTM
suggested comment: Post-translational modification(s) of the protein.

label: PTM info
comment: Post-translational modifications
suggested comment: Information on the post-translational modifications (PTMs) of the protein.

label: Publication
comment: Scientific publication
suggested comment: Publication in the scientific literature.

label: Quality qualifier
comment: Quality qualifiers are used to describe the reliability of an annotation or evidence
suggested comment: Quality qualifier describing the reliability of an annotation or evidence.

label: Redox potential
suggested comment: Value of the standard (midpoint) oxido-reduction potential(s) for the electron transport protein.

label: Region
suggested comment: Region of the protein isoform.

label: Repeat
comment: Positions of repeated sequence motifs or repeated domains
suggested comment: Repeated sequence motifs or domains within the protein isoform.

label: Secondary structure
suggested comment: Secondary structure (helix, turn, beta strand) within the protein.

label: Selenocysteine
comment: Occurence of non-standard amino acids (selenocysteine and pyrrolysine) in the protein sequence
suggested comment: Selenocysteine present in the sequence of the protein.

label: Sequence caution
comment: Errors concerning the protein sequence
suggested comment: Information on difference(s) between the protein isoform sequence(s) shown and other available protein sequences derived from the same gene.

label: Sequence conflict
comment: Sequence discrepancies of unknown origin
suggested comment: Single amino acid difference between the sequence shown and another submitted sequence that cannot be explained by a known polymorphism.

label: Sequence ontology term
comment: Subset of protein feature ontology.

label: Short name
comment: Class for short names related to another name
suggested comment: Shorter version of a name.

label: Short sequence motif
comment: Short (up to 20 amino acids) sequence motif of biological interest
suggested comment: Short sequence motif (up to 20 amino acids) of biological interest in the protein.

label: Signal peptide
comment: Sequence targeting proteins to the secretory pathway or periplasmic space
suggested comment: N-terminal sequence targeting the protein to the secretory pathway.

label: Site
suggested comment: Specific amino acid confering a property to the protein.

label: Small molecule interaction
suggested comment: Interaction of the protein with chemical molecule(s).

label: Source
comment: Data originator
suggested comment: Original source of the data.

label: SRM Peptide mapping
suggested comment: Peptide that can be used to quantify the protein by selected reaction monitoring (SRM) .

label: Subcellular location
comment: Subcellular location of the mature protein
suggested comment: Location in the cell of the mature protein using the UniProt vocabulary.

label: Subcellular location info
comment: Subcellular location information of the mature protein
suggested comment: Note with additional information on the location in the cell of the mature protein.

label: Temperature dependence
suggested comment: Optimal temperature for enzyme activity and/or the variation of enzyme activity with temperature variation. The thermostability of the enzyme is mentioned, when known.

label: Term
comment: A concept used to classify resources.
suggested comment: Term from any controlled vocabulary.

label: Topological domain
comment: Location of non-membrane regions of membrane-spanning proteins.
suggested comment: Location of non-membrane regions within a membrane-spanning protein.

label: Topology
suggested comment: Description of how a transmembrane protein spans the membrane

label: Transit peptide
comment: Extent of a transit peptide for organelle targeting.
suggested comment: N-terminal sequence targeting the protein to to its target destination within the cell.

label: Transmembrane region
comment: Extent of a membrane-spanning region
suggested comment: Region of the protein which spans the membrane.

label: Transport activity
suggested comment: Transport of substances by the protein isoform, usually across a membrane.

label: Turn
comment: Turns within the experimentally determined protein structure
suggested comment: Hydrogen-bonded turn within the protein sequence.

label: UniPathway term
comment: UniProt controlled vocabulary and hierarchical representation of metabolic pathways
suggested comment: Term from the UniProt controlled vocabulary of metabolic pathways.

label: UniProtKB disease term
comment: UniProt controlled vocabulary of human diseases
suggested comment: Term from the UniProt controlled vocabulary of human diseases associated with genetic variations.

label: Uniprot keyword
comment: Ontology annotation by uniprot keyword
suggested comment: UniProt keyword summarising the content of an entry.

label: UniProtKB keyword term
comment: UniProt controlled vocabulary of keywords
suggested comment: UniProt keyword.

label: UniProtKB post-translational modification term
comment: UniProt controlled vocabulary of post-translational modifications.
suggested comment: Term from the UniProt controlled vocabulary of post-translational modifications.

label: UniProtKB region structure term
comment: Control vocabulary to describe the protein region structure.

label: UniProtKB subcellular location term
comment: UniProt controlled vocabulary of subcellular locations.
suggested comment: Term from the UniProt controlled vocabulary of subcellular locations.

label: UniProtKB subcellular orientation term
comment: UniProt controlled vocabulary of subcellular orientations (in UniProt this is part of the UniProt subcellular location CV)
suggested comment: Term from the UniProt controlled vocabulary of subcellular locations describing a subcellular orientation.

label: UniProtKB subcellular topology term
comment: UniProt controlled vocabulary of subcellular topologies (in UniProt this is part of the UniProt subcellular location CV)
suggested comment: Term from the UniProt controlled vocabulary of subcellular locations describing a subcellular topology.

label: Variant
comment: Natural variant of the protein
suggested comment: Sequence variation observed in an individual which may or may not be linked to a disease.

label: Variant info
comment: Description of polymorphism(s)
suggested comment: Information on polymorphic variant(s) of the protein isoform sequence.

comment: The nextprot api version that generate those current data.
suggested comment: Version of the neXtProt API used to generate current data.

label: Cross reference
comment: Cross reference
suggested comment: Link to an external resource providing additional information.

label: Zinc finger region
comment: Position(s) and type(s) of zinc fingers within the protein
suggested comment: Zinc finger region within the protein.
